review:
I and my entire family have been consulting Dr. Chakraborty for the past 12 years. His diagnosis and treatment are exceptional. Brilliant! 

Highly recommended,

Regards
S. Ray Chaudhuri
Kolkata
Thank you for your outstanding dedication and care. Your compassion and kindness have made a real difference in my recovery.
Want to express my heartfelt appreciation for the care and support you have provided. Your commitment to your patients is truly admirable.Thank you sir.

Be very careful about confirming his fees beforehand. Because if you don't he will overcharge you, as I experienced in my interaction with him. His extraction technique is shoddy and I bled for two whole days before it stopped. Dont recommend him at all!

It's really amazing . I am 71 years now. Prior to my having extraction this time on 13th instant , I had very painful experience earlier with other dental surgeons so far as extraction is concerned. Fortunately I could get in touch with Dr. J. Chakraborty this time with the help of my son-in-law . I express my deep gratitude towards Dr. J. Chakraborty for the treatment that he had done to relieve me from my intense pain . Today (22/10/22) just half an hour ago Dr. Chakraborty set my denture and it's perfect . Thanks to Dr. Chakraborty.

A one of a kind experience. I was stuck in Europe with a simple dental problem that those doctors were not able to diagnose. I consulted him on a VC. He simply asked me 5 questions and determined the root cause within 5 minutes and prescribed medication which immediately gave positive results. That's how a doctor should be. Experience Speaketh. Did my tooth extraction and also my pedodontitis cured from him. Simply a super experience.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words.This indeed motivates us to treat our patients with more passion and integrity.
Warm regards 
Dr.Jyotiska chakraborty
